thread.section_title: Sheenco Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sheenco Travel | sheencotravel.com
thread.title: Steven Whitten
thread.title_full: Sheenco Travel reviewed by Steven Whitten

author: Steven Whitten
title: Steven Whitten
text:
Perfect 8 day visit to Ireland.
Sheenco arranged a beautiful adventure across the country with a private car and driver for the entire trip - John Joe was fantastic. We covered about 18 counties, about 13 castles/manors/abbeys, Cliffs, sheep farm/dogs, mountains, lakes, hawks and ruins.
3 nights at Ashford Castle was definitely the highlight. 2 nights at PowersCourt was also excellent
We will be back to cover the Southern area and Ring of Kerry. Maybe this Spring.
A very attentive and wonderful staff.
Thank you all,
Steven Whitten
